body.p:
You can use the Readability action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Overview category to ask the AI Positron to summarize the contents of a DITA XML topic.

A Readability Overview AI action is incredibly useful to end users as it provides a quick and comprehensive analysis of the readability of a specific content. This AI action breaks down complex texts into easily digestible information, highlighting the overall readability score, key readability metrics, and offering suggestions for improvement. By utilizing this feature, users can assess the readability level of a piece of content before investing their time in reading it. It helps users make informed decisions about whether the content is appropriate for their needs, whether it is too complex or too simple for their comprehension level, and whether it aligns with their reading preferences. With this valuable insight, users can save time and effort by prioritizing content that is most suitable for their reading abilities and preferences.
Open the topic and invoke the Readability action.
